page.title: 08CHILDREN'S PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {KISS CHASE}girls after boys or vice versa,if caught,kissed and then sit out until next game.Game ends when all caught and kissed. {POM!}pom post is selected (drainpipe dustbin etc) IT counts to 50 whilst others hide somewhere.IT then seeks and if IT finds.IT returns to pom post quickly and says "Pom 1,2,3"followed by spied persons name.Pommed player then waits by pom post and becomes IT in next game.But if spied player gets to pom post before.IT,he'll say "pom 1 2 3 myself" and is free. Game ends when all are spied and pommed. {BRITISH BULLDOG}one players is catcher (IT).Players dodge past IT from one playground lines to another.If caught,also becomes an IT. game finish when all are caught. {BY FIONA LAUNDON {
